AddSmsSign.document:
1. This API is used to add an SMS signature. You need to read the [Tencent Cloud SMS Signature Review Standards](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/zh/document/product/382/40658) before starting an application.
2. ⚠️ Note: individual users cannot use this API to apply for SMS signatures. For more information, see [Identity Verification Overview](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/378/3629?from_cn_redirect=1). If your account identity is individual, you can log in to the console to apply for SMS signatures.
>- Note: because of the improved security of **TencentCloud API 3.0**, **API authentication** is more complicated. We recommend you use the Tencent Cloud SMS service with the SDK.
>- You can run this API directly in [API 3.0 Explorer](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/api/explorer?Product=sms&Version=2021-01-11&Action=SendSms), which eliminates the signature calculation steps. After it is executed successfully, API Explorer can **automatically generate** SDK code samples.
AddSmsSign.name: Adds SMS signature

AddSmsTemplate.document:
1. This API is used to add an SMS template. You need to read the [Tencent Cloud SMS Body Template Review Standards](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/zh/document/product/382/40659) before starting an application.
2. ⚠️ Note: individual users cannot use this API to apply for SMS body templates. For more information, see [Identity Verification Overview](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/zh/document/product/378/3629). If your account identity is individual, you can log in to the [console](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/smsv2) to apply for SMS body templates.
>- Note: because of the improved security of **TencentCloud API 3.0**, **API authentication** is more complicated. We recommend you use the Tencent Cloud SMS service with the SDK.
>- You can run this API directly in [API 3.0 Explorer](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/api/explorer?Product=sms&Version=2021-01-11&Action=SendSms), which eliminates the signature calculation steps. After it is executed successfully, API Explorer can **automatically generate** SDK code samples.
AddSmsTemplate.name: Adds SMS template

CallbackStatusStatistics.document:
This API is used to collect statistics on user receipts.
>- Note: because of the improved security of **TencentCloud API 3.0**, **API authentication** is more complicated. We recommend you use the Tencent Cloud SMS service with the SDK.
>- You can run this API directly in [API 3.0 Explorer](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/api/explorer?Product=sms&Version=2021-01-11&Action=SendSms), which eliminates the signature calculation steps. After it is executed successfully, API Explorer can **automatically generate** SDK code samples.
CallbackStatusStatistics.name: Collects statistics on receipts

DeleteSmsSign.document:
⚠️ Note: individual users cannot use this API to delete SMS signatures. For more information, please see [Identity Verification Overview](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/378/3629?from_cn_redirect=1). Please log in to the [console](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/smsv2) to delete SMS signatures.
>- Note: because of the improved security of **TencentCloud API 3.0**, **API authentication** is more complicated. We recommend you use the Tencent Cloud SMS service with the SDK.
>- You can run this API directly in [API 3.0 Explorer](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/api/explorer?Product=sms&Version=2021-01-11&Action=SendSms), which eliminates the signature calculation steps. After it is executed successfully, API Explorer can **automatically generate** SDK code samples.
DeleteSmsSign.name: Deletes SMS signature

DeleteSmsTemplate.document:
⚠️ Note: individual users cannot use this API to delete SMS body templates. Please log in to the [console](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/smsv2) to do so. For more information, please see [Identity Verification Overview](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/378/3629?from_cn_redirect=1).
>- Note: because of the improved security of **TencentCloud API 3.0**, **API authentication** is more complicated. We recommend you use the Tencent Cloud SMS service with the SDK.
>- You can run this API directly in [API 3.0 Explorer](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/api/explorer?Product=sms&Version=2021-01-11&Action=SendSms), which eliminates the signature calculation steps. After it is executed successfully, API Explorer can **automatically generate** SDK code samples.
DeleteSmsTemplate.name: Deletes SMS template

DescribePhoneNumberInfo.document:
This API is used to query the information of a phone number, including country/region code and standardized E.164 format number.
>- For example, if you query the number +86018845720123, you can get the country/region code 86 and the standardized E.164 number +8618845720123.
DescribePhoneNumberInfo.name: Queries mobile number information

DescribeSmsSignList.document:
⚠️ Note: individual users cannot use this API to query SMS signatures. For more information, please see [Identity Verification Overview](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/378/3629?from_cn_redirect=1). If your account identity is individual, you can log in to the [console](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/smsv2) to query SMS signatures.
>- Note: because of the improved security of **TencentCloud API 3.0**, **API authentication** is more complicated. We recommend you use the Tencent Cloud SMS service with the SDK.
>- You can run this API directly in [API 3.0 Explorer](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/api/explorer?Product=sms&Version=2021-01-11&Action=SendSms), which eliminates the signature calculation steps. After it is executed successfully, API Explorer can **automatically generate** SDK code samples.
DescribeSmsSignList.name: Queries SMS signature status

DescribeSmsTemplateList.document:
⚠️ Note: individual users cannot use this API to query SMS body templates. For more information, please see [Identity Verification Overview](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/378/3629?from_cn_redirect=1).
>- Note: because of the improved security of **TencentCloud API 3.0**, **API authentication** is more complicated. We recommend you use the Tencent Cloud SMS service with the SDK.
>- You can run this API directly in [API 3.0 Explorer](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/api/explorer?Product=sms&Version=2021-01-11&Action=SendSms), which eliminates the signature calculation steps. After it is executed successfully, API Explorer can **automatically generate** SDK code samples.
DescribeSmsTemplateList.name: Queries SMS template status

ModifySmsSign.document:
1. This API is used to modify an SMS signature. Read the [Tencent Cloud SMS signature review standards](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/382/40658) before making a modification.
2. ⚠️ Note: Individual users cannot use this API to modify SMS signatures. For more information, see [Identity Verification Guide](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/378/3629). If your account identity is individual, you can log in to the [console](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/smsv2) to modify SMS signatures.
3. Modifications can be made only if the signature status is **Pending Review** or **Rejected**. **Approved** signatures cannot be modified.
>- Note: Because of the improved security of **TencentCloud API 3.0**, **API authentication** is more complicated. We recommend you use the Tencent Cloud SMS service with the SDK.
>- You can run this API directly in [API 3.0 Explorer](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/api/explorer?Product=sms&Version=2021-01-11&Action=SendSms), which eliminates the signature calculation steps. After it is executed successfully, API Explorer can **automatically generate** SDK code samples.
ModifySmsSign.name: Modifies SMS signature

ModifySmsTemplate.document:
1. This API is used to modify an SMS body template. Please read the [Tencent Cloud SMS Body Template Review Standards](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/382/39023?from_cn_redirect=1) before making a modification.
2. ⚠️ Note: individual users cannot use this API to modify SMS body templates. For more information, please see [Identity Verification Overview](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/378/3629?from_cn_redirect=1). If your account identity is individual, you can log in to the [console](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/smsv2) to modify SMS body templates.
3. Modifications can be made only if the body template status is **Pending Review** or **Rejected**. **Approved** body templates cannot be modified.
>- Note: because of the improved security of **TencentCloud API 3.0**, **API authentication** is more complicated. We recommend you use the Tencent Cloud SMS service with the SDK.
>- You can run this API directly in [API 3.0 Explorer](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/api/explorer?Product=sms&Version=2019-07-11&Action=SendSms), which eliminates the signature calculation steps. After it is executed successfully, API Explorer can **automatically generate** SDK code samples.
ModifySmsTemplate.name: Modifies SMS template

PullSmsReplyStatus.document:
This API is used to pull SMS reply status.
Currently, you can also [configure the reply callback](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/382/42907?from_cn_redirect=1) to get replies.
>- Note: You need to contact [SMS Helper](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/382/3773?from_cn_redirect=1#.E6.8A.80.E6.9C.AF.E4.BA.A4.E6.B5.81) to activate this API.
>- Note: Because of the improved security of **TencentCloud API 3.0**, **API authentication** is more complicated. We recommend you use the Tencent Cloud SMS service with the SDK.
>- You can run this API directly in [API 3.0 Explorer](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/api/explorer?Product=sms&Version=2021-01-11&Action=SendSms), which eliminates the signature calculation steps. After it is executed successfully, API Explorer can **automatically generate** SDK code samples.
PullSmsReplyStatus.name: Pulls SMS reply status

PullSmsReplyStatusByPhoneNumber.document:
This API is used to pull SMS reply status for one single number.
Currently, you can also [configure the reply callback](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/382/42907?from_cn_redirect=1) to get replies.
>- Note: because of the improved security of **TencentCloud API 3.0**, **API authentication** is more complicated. We recommend you use the Tencent Cloud SMS service with the SDK.
>- You can run this API directly in [API 3.0 Explorer](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/api/explorer?Product=sms&Version=2021-01-11&Action=SendSms), which eliminates the signature calculation steps. After it is executed successfully, API Explorer can **automatically generate** SDK code samples.
PullSmsReplyStatusByPhoneNumber.name: Pulls SMS reply status for one single number

PullSmsSendStatus.document:
This API is used to pull SMS delivery status.
Currently, you can also [configure the callback](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/382/37809?from_cn_redirect=1#.E8.AE.BE.E7.BD.AE.E4.BA.8B.E4.BB.B6.E5.9B.9E.E8.B0.83.E9.85.8D.E7.BD.AE) to get the delivery status.
>- Note: you need to contact [SMS Helper](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/382/3773?from_cn_redirect=1#.E6.8A.80.E6.9C.AF.E4.BA.A4.E6.B5.81) to activate this API.
>- Note: because of the improved security of **TencentCloud API 3.0**, **API authentication** is more complicated. We recommend you use the Tencent Cloud SMS service with the SDK.
>- You can run this API directly in [API 3.0 Explorer](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/api/explorer?Product=sms&Version=2021-01-11&Action=SendSms), which eliminates the signature calculation steps. After it is executed successfully, API Explorer can **automatically generate** SDK code samples.
PullSmsSendStatus.name: Pulls SMS delivery status

PullSmsSendStatusByPhoneNumber.document:
This API is used to pull SMS delivery status for one single number.
Currently, you can also [configure the callback](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/382/37809?from_cn_redirect=1#.E8.AE.BE.E7.BD.AE.E4.BA.8B.E4.BB.B6.E5.9B.9E.E8.B0.83.E9.85.8D.E7.BD.AE) to get the delivery status.
>- Note: because of the improved security of **TencentCloud API 3.0**, **API authentication** is more complicated. We recommend you use the Tencent Cloud SMS service with the SDK.
>- You can run this API directly in [API 3.0 Explorer](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/api/explorer?Product=sms&Version=2021-01-11&Action=SendSms) to eliminate the need to calculate signatures. After it is executed successfully, API Explorer can **automatically generate** SDK code samples.
PullSmsSendStatusByPhoneNumber.name: Pulls SMS delivery status for one single number

ReportConversion.document:
This API is used to report the SMS conversion rate (SMS conversion rate = the number of returned verification codes / the number of verification codes sent) and report the serial numbers of received SMS messages to Tencent Cloud SMS.
>- Note: To call this API, you need to be added to the allowlist first. If you have any questions, contact [SMS Helper](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/382/3773?from_cn_redirect=1#.E6.8A.80.E6.9C.AF.E4.BA.A4.E6.B5.81).
ReportConversion.name: Reports the SMS conversion rate

SendSms.document:
This API is used to send SMS verification codes, notification, or marketing messages to users.
>- Note: Because of the improved security of **TencentCloud API 3.0**, **API authentication** is more complicated. We recommend you use the Tencent Cloud SMS service with the [SDK](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/382/43193?from_cn_redirect=1).
>- Note: You can run this API directly in [API 3.0 Explorer](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/api/explorer?Product=sms&Version=2021-01-11&Action=SendSms), which eliminates the signature calculation steps. After it is executed successfully, API Explorer can **automatically generate** SDK code samples.
>- Note: This API is currently on the 2021-01-11 version. If you are still using the [2019-07-11 version](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/382/38778?from_cn_redirect=1), we recommend you use this latest version. For version differences, see [Version description](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/382/63195?from_cn_redirect=1#.E7.89.88.E6.9C.AC.E6.8F.8F.E8.BF.B0).
SendSms.name: Sends SMS messages

SendStatusStatistics.document:
This API is used to collect statistics on SMS messages sent by users.
>- Note: because of the improved security of **TencentCloud API 3.0**, **API authentication** is more complicated. We recommend you use the Tencent Cloud SMS service with the SDK.
>- You can run this API directly in [API 3.0 Explorer](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/api/explorer?Product=sms&Version=2021-01-11&Action=SendSms), which eliminates the signature calculation steps. After it is executed successfully, API Explorer can **automatically generate** SDK code samples.
SendStatusStatistics.name: Collects statistics on SMS delivery

members.document: Signature ID.
members.name: SignId

members.document:
Signature name.
Note: you cannot apply for an approved or pending signature again.
members.name: SignName

members.document:
Signature type. Each of these types is followed by their `DocumentType` (identity certificate type) option:
0: company. Valid values of `DocumentType` include 0 and 1.
1: app. Valid values of `DocumentType` include 0, 1, 2, 3, and 4.
2: website. Valid values of `DocumentType` include 0, 1, 2, 3, and 5.
3: WeChat Official Account. Valid values of `DocumentType` include 0, 1, 2, 3, and 8.
4: trademark. Valid values of `DocumentType` include 7.
5: government/public institution/other. Valid values of `DocumentType` include 2 and 3.
6: WeChat Mini Program. Valid values of `DocumentType` include 0, 1, 2, 3, and 6.
Note: the identity certificate type must be selected according to the correspondence; otherwise, the review will fail.
members.name: SignType

members.document:
Identity certificate type:
0: three-in-one licence.
1: business license.
2: organization code certificate.
3: social credit code certificate.
4: screenshot of application backend management (for personal app).
5: screenshot of website ICP filing backend (for personal website).
6: screenshot of WeChat Mini Program settings page (for personal WeChat Mini Program).
7: trademark registration certificate.
8: screenshot of WeChat Official Account settings page (for personal WeChat Official Account).
members.name: DocumentType

members.document:
Whether it is Global SMS:
0: Mainland China SMS.
1: Global SMS.
members.name: International

members.document:
Signature purpose:
0: for personal use.
1: for others.
members.name: SignPurpose

members.document: You should Base64-encode the image of the identity certificate corresponding to the signature first, remove the prefix `data:image/jpeg;base64,` from the resulted string, and then use it as the value of this parameter.
members.name: ProofImage

members.document:
Power of attorney, which should be submitted if `SignPurpose` is for use by others.
You should Base64-encode the image first, remove the prefix `data:image/jpeg;base64,` from the resulted string, and then use it as the value of this parameter.
Note: this field will take effect only when `SignPurpose` is 1 (for user by others).
members.name: CommissionImage

members.document: Signature addition response
members.name: AddSignStatus

members.document: SMS type. 0: regular SMS, 1: marketing SMS.

Whether it is Global SMS:
0: Mainland China SMS.
1: Global SMS.

members.document: Invalid numbers.

members.name: ShutdownErrorCount

members.document: Blocked mobile numbers.
members.name: BlackListCount

members.document: Carrier rate limit hits.
members.name: FrequencyLimitCount

members.document: Start time in the format of `yyyymmddhh` accurate to the hour, such as 2021050113 (13:00 on May 1, 2021).
members.name: BeginTime

members.document:
End time in the format of `yyyymmddhh` accurate to the hour, such as 2021050118 (18:00 on May 1, 2021).
Note: `EndTime` must be after `BeginTime`, and the difference should not exceed 32 days.
members.name: EndTime

members.document: The SMS `SdkAppId` generated after an application is added in the [SMS console](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/smsv2/app-manage), such as 1400006666.
members.name: SmsSdkAppId

members.document:
Upper limit.
Note: this parameter is currently fixed at 0.

members.document:
Offset.
Note: this parameter is currently fixed at 0.

members.name: DeleteTime

members.document:
A parameter used to query mobile numbers in E.164 format (+[country/region code][subscriber number]). Up to 200 mobile numbers can be queried at a time.
Take the number +8613711112222 as an example. “86” is the country code (with a “+” sign in its front) and “13711112222” is the subscriber number.
members.name: PhoneNumberSet

members.document: A parameter used to obtain mobile number information.
members.name: PhoneNumberInfoSet

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.name: International

members.document:
Signature application status. Valid values: 0: approved; 1: under review.
-1: application rejected or failed.

Signature ID array.
Note: the maximum length of the array is 100 by default.

Whether it is Global SMS:

1: Global SMS.
members.name: International

members.document:
Array of template IDs. If the array is empty, the template list information will be queried by default. You need to use the `Limit` and `Offset` fields to set the query range.
<dx-alert infotype="notice" title="Note">The max array length is 100 by default.</dx-alert>
members.name: TemplateIdSet

members.document:
Upper limit. Maximum value: 100.
Note: it is 0 by default and is enabled when `TemplateIdSet` is empty.
members.name: Limit

members.document:
Offset.
Note: it is 0 by default and is enabled when `TemplateIdSet` is empty.

members.document: Whether it is Global SMS. 0: Mainland China SMS; 1: Global SMS.
members.name: International

members.document: Template application status. Valid values: 0: approved and effective; 1: under review; 2: approved but to be effective; -1: application rejected or failed.

members.document: Review reply, i.e., response given by the reviewer, which is usually the reason for rejection.

members.document:
Signature type. Each of these types is followed by their `DocumentType` (identity certificate type) option:
0: company. Valid values of `DocumentType` include 0 and 1.
1: app. Valid values of `DocumentType` include 0, 1, 2, 3, and 4.
2: website. Valid values of `DocumentType` include 0, 1, 2, 3, and 5.
3: WeChat Official Account. Valid values of `DocumentType` include 0, 1, 2, 3, and 8.
4: trademark. Valid values of `DocumentType` include 7.
5: government/public institution/other. Valid values of `DocumentType` include 2 and 3.
6: WeChat Mini Program. Valid values of `DocumentType` include 0, 1, 2, 3, and 6.
Note: the identity certificate type must be selected according to the correspondence; otherwise, the review will fail.
members.name: SignType

members.document:
Identity certificate type:
0: three-in-one.
1: business license.
2: organization code certificate.
3: social credit code certificate.
4: screenshot of application backend management (for personal app).
5: screenshot of website ICP filing backend (for personal website).
6: screenshot of WeChat Mini Program settings page (for personal WeChat Mini Program).
7: trademark registration certificate.
8: screenshot of WeChat Official Account settings page (for personal WeChat Official Account).
members.name: DocumentType

members.document:
A parameter used to specify whether it is Global SMS:
`0`: Chinese mainland SMS.
`1`: Global SMS.
Note: the value of this parameter must be consistent with the `International` value of the signature to be modified. This parameter cannot be used to directly change a Chinese mainland signature to an international signature.
members.name: International

members.document:
Signature purpose:
0: for personal use.
1: for others.
members.name: SignPurpose

members.document: You should Base64-encode the image of the identity certificate corresponding to the signature first, remove the prefix `data:image/jpeg;base64,` from the resulted string, and then use it as the value of this parameter.
members.name: ProofImage

members.document:
Power of attorney, which should be submitted if `SignPurpose` is for use by others.
You should Base64-encode the image first, remove the prefix `data:image/jpeg;base64,` from the resulted string, and then use it as the value of this parameter.
Note: this field will take effect only when `SignPurpose` is 1 (for user by others).

members.document: Error code for mobile number information query. `Ok` will be returned if the query is successful.
members.name: Code

members.document: Description of the error code for mobile number information query.
members.name: Message

members.document: Country (or region) code.
members.name: NationCode

members.document: Subscriber number in normal format such as 13711112222, without any prefix (country or region code).
members.name: SubscriberNumber

members.document: The standardized mobile number in E.164 format after parsing, which is consistent with the parsed number for SMS message delivery. If the parsing fails, the original number will be returned.
members.name: PhoneNumber

members.document: Country or region code such as CN and US. If the country or region code cannot be identified, `DEF` will be returned by default.
members.name: IsoCode

members.document: Country code or region name such as China. For more information, see [Global SMS Price Overview](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/382/18051?from_cn_redirect=1#.E6.97.A5.E7.BB.93.E5.90.8E.E4.BB.98.E8.B4.B9.3Ca-id.3D.22post-payment.22.3E.3C.2Fa.3E)
members.name: IsoName

members.document: SMS code number extension, which is not activated by default. If you need to activate it, please contact [SMS Helper](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/382/3773?from_cn_redirect=1#.E6.8A.80.E6.9C.AF.E4.BA.A4.E6.B5.81).
members.name: ExtendCode

members.document: Country (or region) code.
members.name: CountryCode

members.document: Mobile number in the E.164 standard (+[country/region code][mobile number]), such as +8613711112222, which has a + sign followed by 86 (country/region code) and then by 13711112222 (mobile number).

members.name: SignName

members.document: User reply.
members.name: ReplyContent

members.document: Reply time in seconds in the format of UNIX timestamp.

members.document: User's mobile number in a common format such as 13711112222.
members.name: SubscriberNumber

members.document:
Pull start time in seconds in the format of UNIX timestamp.
Note: the data for the last 7 days can be pulled at most.
members.name: BeginTime

members.document:
Offset.
Note: this parameter is currently fixed at 0.
members.name: Offset

members.name: Limit

members.document: Actual time of SMS receipt by user in seconds in the format of UNIX timestamp.
members.name: UserReceiveTime

members.document: Country (or region) code.
members.name: CountryCode

members.document: User's mobile number in a common format such as 13711112222.
members.name: SubscriberNumber

members.document: Mobile number in the E.164 standard (+[country/region code][mobile number]), such as +8613711112222, which has a + sign followed by 86 (country/region code) and then by 13711112222 (mobile number).
members.name: PhoneNumber

members.document: ID of the current delivery.
members.name: SerialNo

members.document: Whether the SMS message is actually received. Valid values: SUCCESS (success), FAIL (failure).
members.name: ReportStatus

members.document: Description of SMS receipt by user.
members.name: Description

members.document:
User session content, which is the same as the `SessionContext` in the request and is empty by default. If you need to activate it, contact [SMS Helper](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/382/3773?from_cn_redirect=1#.E6.8A.80.E6.9C.AF.E4.BA.A4.E6.B5.81).
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: SessionContext

members.document:
Pull start time in seconds in the format of UNIX timestamp.
Note: the data for the last 7 days can be pulled at most.
members.name: BeginTime

members.document:
Offset.
Note: this parameter is currently fixed at 0.
members.name: Offset

members.document: Maximum number of pulled entries. Maximum value: 100.
members.name: Limit

members.document: Target mobile number in the E.164 standard (+[country/region code][mobile number]), such as +8613711112222, which has a + sign followed by 86 (country/region code) and then by 13711112222 (mobile number).
members.name: PhoneNumber

members.document: The SMS `SdkAppId` generated after an application is added in the [SMS console](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/smsv2/app-manage), such as 1400006666.

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.

members.document: Maximum number of pulled entries. Maximum value: 100.
members.name: Limit

members.document: The SMS `SdkAppId` generated after an application is added in the [SMS console](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/smsv2/app-manage), such as 1400006666.

members.document: Delivery status response set.
members.name: PullSmsSendStatusSet

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: The SMS SdkAppId generated after an application is created in the [SMS console](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/smsv2/app-manage), such as “1400006666”.
members.name: SmsSdkAppId

members.document: The serial number returned for a message sent.
members.name: SerialNo

members.document: The recipient’s reply time in seconds in the format of UNIX timestamp.
members.name: ConversionTime

members.document: Response packet for conversion rate reporting.
members.name: ReportConversionStatus

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Error code. `ok` is returned if the conversion rate is successfully reported.
members.name: Code

members.document: Error code description.
members.name: Message

members.document: Target mobile number in the E.164 standard in the format of +[country/region code][mobile number]. Up to 200 mobile numbers are supported in one request (which should be all Chinese mainland mobile numbers or all global mobile numbers). For example, +60198890000, which has a + sign followed by 60 (country/region code) and then by 198890000 (mobile number).
members.name: PhoneNumberSet

members.document: The SMS `SdkAppId` generated after an application is added in the [SMS console](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/smsv2/app-manage), such as 2400006666.
members.name: SmsSdkAppId

members.document: Template ID, which can be viewed on the **Body Templates** page in [Global SMS](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/smsv2/isms-template). You must enter the ID of an approved template.
members.name: TemplateId

members.document: SMS signature information which is encoded in UTF-8. You must enter an approved signature (such as Tencent Cloud). The signing information can be viewed on the **Signatures** page in [Global SMS](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/smsv2/isms-sign).
members.name: SignName

members.document:
Template parameter. If there is no template parameter, leave this field empty.
<dx-alert infotype="notice" title="Note">The number of template parameters should be consistent with that of the template variables of `TemplateId`.</dx-alert>
members.name: TemplateParamSet

members.document: SMS code number extension, which is not activated by default. If you need to activate it, you can contact [SMS Helper](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/382/3773?from_cn_redirect=1#.E6.8A.80.E6.9C.AF.E4.BA.A4.E6.B5.81).
members.name: ExtendCode

members.document: User session content, which can carry context information such as user-side ID and will be returned as-is by the server. Note that the length must be less than 512 bytes.
members.name: SessionContext

members.document:
For Global SMS, if you have applied for a separate `SenderId`, this parameter is required. By default, the public `SenderId` is used, in which case you don't need to enter this parameter.
Note: If your monthly usage reaches the specified threshold, you can apply for an independent `SenderId`. For more information, contact [SMS Helper](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/382/3773?from_cn_redirect=1#.E6.8A.80.E6.9C.AF.E4.BA.A4.E6.B5.81).
members.name: SenderId

members.document: SMS delivery status.
members.name: SendStatusSet

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Delivery serial number.
members.name: SerialNo

members.document: Mobile number in the E.164 standard (+[country/region code][mobile number]), such as +8613711112222, which has a + sign followed by 86 (country/region code) and then by 13711112222 (mobile number).
members.name: PhoneNumber

members.document: Number of billable SMS messages. For billing rules, see Billing Policy.
members.name: Fee

members.document: User session content.
members.name: SessionContext

members.document: SMS request error code. For specific meanings, see [Error Codes](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/zh/document/product/382/40536#6.-error-code). `Ok` will be returned for successful delivery.
members.name: Code

members.document: SMS request error message.
members.name: Message

members.document: Country/Region code, such as CN and US. For unrecognized country/region codes, `DEF` is returned by default. For the specific list of supported values, please see [Global SMS Price Overview](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/382/18051?from_cn_redirect=1).
members.name: IsoCode

members.document: Billable SMS message quantity; for example, in 100 successfully submitted SMS messages, if 20 ones are long messages (over 80 characters) and split into two messages each, then the billable quantity will be 80 * 1 + 20 * 2 = 120.
members.name: FeeCount

members.document: Submitted SMS messages.
members.name: RequestCount

members.document: Successfully submitted SMS messages.
members.name: RequestSuccessCount

members.document: Start time in the format of `yyyymmddhh` accurate to the hour, such as 2021050113 (13:00 on May 1, 2021).
members.name: BeginTime

members.document:
End time in the format of `yyyymmddhh` accurate to the hour, such as 2021050118 (18:00 on May 1, 2021).
Note: `EndTime` must be after `BeginTime`.
members.name: EndTime

members.document: The SMS `SdkAppId` generated after an application is added in the [SMS console](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/smsv2/app-manage), such as 1400006666.
members.name: SmsSdkAppId

members.document:
Upper limit.
Note: this parameter is currently fixed at 0.
members.name: Limit

members.document:
Offset.
Note: this parameter is currently fixed at 0.
members.name: Offset

members.document: Delivery statistics response body.
members.name: SendStatusStatistics

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
